cap.headline: Welcome to CAP: Cardano Analytics Powered by AI
cap.lead: Simplifying Cardano blockchain data exploration through natural language, bridging complex on-chain data with user-friendly insights via a custom LLM and a Semantic Knowledge Graph.

cta.title: Ready to explore Cardano data the fast way?
cta.description: Sign in above to access your workspace and start pinning insights.

pillars.title: Our Roadmap: The Three Pillars of Innovation

llm.title: Fine-Tuned Cardano LLM
llm.desc: A specialized AI reasoning engine trained to understand Cardano’s domain-specific data structures, ontologies, and governance mechanics.

kg.title: Cardano Knowledge Graph
kg.desc: A semantic source of truth linking on-chain activity with off-chain metadata for holistic, contextual blockchain analysis.

dashboards.title: User-Centric Smart Dashboards
dashboards.desc: Interactive, customizable workspaces where users pin AI-generated charts and tables for real-time monitoring and exploration.

step1.title: Ask in Natural Language
step1.desc: Users can input blockchain queries using everyday language — no SQL or SPARQL required.

step2.title: Semantic Translation
step2.desc: CAP’s AI translates your human question into precise, executable SPARQL queries over the Cardano knowledge graph.

step3.title: Instant Visual Results
step3.desc: Results are automatically rendered into interactive Vega-Lite charts or structured tables.

examples.body: Examples of advanced queries the platform we are targeting.
examples.title: Our Target: Complex and Advanced Queries Made Easy

items.query: List top 5 meme tokens by volume
Compare voter turnout by proposal label

footer.tagline: Building advanced data and AI infrastructure for decentralized ecosystems.

analyses.title: My Analyses
analyses.subtitle: Browse your conversations on a dedicated view.
analyses.searchPlaceholder: Search by title, preview, or id…
analyses.accessDeniedText: Please log in to view your analyses.

landing.emptySubtitle: Query the Cardano blockchain using natural language. Ask about transactions, blocks, stake pools, governance, or any on-chain data.
landing.unexpectedError: Unexpected error while processing your query.
landing.pinInvalidTable: This table result is empty or invalid and cannot be pinned.
landing.pinSuccess: Pinned to your dashboard (click to open).
landing.syncBlockedOffline: Sync service is offline. Queries are temporarily disabled.
landing.syncBlockedUnknown: Sync status is unavailable. Please wait a moment and retry.

emptyRotating.2: Plot a chart of monthly NFT minting activity in December 2025
emptyRotating.3: How much of the ADA supply is held by the top 1%?
emptyRotating.4: Show the latest governance proposals and their IPFS links
